text: 🇭🇺 Hungary has become the first EU country to approve a #Covid19 #vaccine developed in China. A few weeks ago, it was also the first in the EU to greenlight the Covid-19 vaccine Sputnik V, developed by the Gamaleya Center in Russia. Learn more: https://t.co/G0Tfldbxv3 #biotech https://t.co/c34lCkF1Bh
